description: A React functional component implementing a reusable dialog/modal used for forms and confirmations, with props to control visibility, content, and closure behavior.

methods.name: Dialog({ open, onClose, children })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a modal dialog. It displays children content if open is true, with a close button that triggers onClose.

ctags.name: Dialog
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Dialog({ open, onClose, children }) {$/
